TopicTitle: Old parts not getting replaced when updating to 1.0

Articles.Content:
Looking at my parts list, and I notice that the old model for the standard one-wheel airplane landing gear isn't being replaced by the new one from this image:

What I'm seeing in the VAB:

I'm also noticing that some other parts aren't being replaced or deleted even though some new parts appear to be their direct replacements, such as the old AV-R8 Winglet performing an apparently identical role as both the "standard canard" and "tail fin."

I've tried deleting and re-acquiring the Squad folder within GameData but these old parts just aren't going poof. Haven't tried a full reinstall, however - should I?

Thanks for any help.
The new small bay wasn't finished, the old small bay is staying in for the time being, so this is "normal"

The new small bay wasn't finished, the old small bay is staying in for the time being, so this is "normal"

Ah, okay, good to know. Thanks!
